About Me

Allow me to introduce myself and explain my professional pursuits briefly.

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

I'm a 30-year-old professional who just earned a master's degree in artificial intelligence and machine learning. My educational experience has given me a strong foundation in machine learning and the knowledge and abilities to tackle challenging problems in this innovative subject. My steadfast dedication to academic and research endeavors has motivated me to pursue Ph.D. opportunities at esteemed universities where I hope to impact the field of artificial intelligence significantly.
Before pursuing my studies, I worked as a front-end developer for over two years in the beautiful northern Iranian province of Guilan, Rasht. I improved my software development abilities, especially in front-end development. I am in an excellent position to contribute creativity and knowledge to upcoming projects in artificial intelligence research and development because of my unique combination of real-world software development experience and a solid academic foundation in machine learning.
